snippet: In the wake of the state’s new law on illegal immigration, education officials say scores of immigrant families have withdrawn or kept children at home this week, afraid that sending them would draw attention from the authorities.
lead_paragraph: In the wake of the state’s new law on illegal immigration, education officials say scores of immigrant families have withdrawn or kept children at home this week, afraid that sending them would draw attention from the authorities.

headline.main: Alabama: Many Immigrants Pull Children From Schools
headline.print_headline: Alabama: Many Immigrants Pull Children From Schools
